briefTitle: Phase I Study of Dasatinib (BMS-354825) and Capecitabine for Women With Advanced Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Phase I Study of Dasatinib (BMS-354825) and Capecitabine for Advanced Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Participants With Dose Limiting Toxicities Per Dose Level - Safety Population
eligibilityCriteria:
For additional information, please contact the BMS oncology clinical trial information service at 855-216-0126 or email MyCancerStudyConnect@emergingmed.com. Please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com for more information on clinical trial participation.

Inclusion Criteria:

* Female with advanced breast cancer previously treated with a taxane and an anthracycline
* No pleural or pericardial effusion
* Not receiving anticoagulants
